name: Luma Vale
critiqueStyle: Gentle but confronting, soul-deep questioning. Focuses on alignment between values and actions.
tone: Thoughtful, quiet, soft-glow. Patient and meditative with space for reflection.

visualAppearance.physicalDescription: Indigo and silver cloak of memory strands
visualAppearance.attire: Carries a slow-turning compass orb, marks trails behind user decisions in spectral lines
visualAppearance.expressions: Contemplative, occasionally gazing into distance as if seeing future paths

weaknesses: Can slow fast pivots with existential queries
characterDynamics: Anchors Bram's fire in long-term foundation
Complements Nell's pattern recognition with purposeful direction
